title: Today's Snowdown mission
body:
Play two matches of a mode you may or may not enjoy with champs you may or may not enjoy or own.

0. Pick Rengar as the only free Shuriman champ
0. Try to play Rengar
0. Which rework is Rengar on?
0. Team is 1-10 at 4:00
0. Start trying to /ff at 8:00

There's a huge difference between playing a specific thing because you think you'd _enjoy_ it and being railroaded into playing a specific thing because limited-time exclusive rewards are _locked_ behind it.
